mapper.insert: insert into User(id, password, userName, userPhone, Type, isRented) values(#{id},#{password},#{userName},#{userPhone},#{Type},0);
mapper.update: update User set isRented = 1 where id = #{id}
update User set isRented = 0 where id = #{uid}
update User set isRented = 0 where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
